com.diffplug.common.rx

Interface RxBox<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.diffplug.common.base.Box<T>, java.util.function.Consumer<T>, IObservable<T>, RxGetter<T>, java.util.function.Supplier<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RxBox.Default, RxList, RxMap, RxOptional, RxOrderedSet, RxSet

    public interface RxBox<T>
extends RxGetter<T>, com.diffplug.common.base.Box<T>
    RxGetter and Nullable combined in one.
